title: Furnishing is fun
brief_description: How an average family in 1961, whose children have grown up, refurnishes the home. Shows the range of furnishings available in Australia, the advisory services, especially colour consultants and gives some indication of costs involved. Narrated by Gordon Bell and scripted by Burton Graham.
